Package edu.xtec.jclic.bags

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MediaBag.Listener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityBag
    This class stores the complete collection of activities of a JClicProject.
    ActivityBagEditor  
    ActivityBagEditorPanel  
    ActivityBagElement
    This class stores a XML Element that defines an Activity.
    ActivityBagElementEditor  
    ActivitySequence
    This class stores the definition of the sequence of activities related to a specific JClicProject.
    ActivitySequenceEditor  
    ActivitySequenceEditorPanel  
    ActivitySequenceElement
    This class defines a specific point into a JClic sequence of activities: what activity must run at this point, what to do or where to jump when the activity finishes, the behavior of the "next" and "prev" buttons, etc.
    ActivitySequenceElementEditor  
    ActivitySequenceElementEditorPanel  
    ActivitySequenceJump
    This is a special case of JumpInfo, used only in ActivitySequenceElement objects.
    ActivitySequenceTable
    Subclass of BasicTableUI
    ConditionalJumpInfo
    This special case of JumpInfo is used in ActivitySequenceJump objects to decide the jump to be taked (or the action to be performed) based on the results obtained by the user when playing JClic activities.
    ConditionalJumpPanel  
    JumpInfo
    This class contains information about what the sequence manager of JClic must do in specific circumstances: when an activity finishes, when the user clicks on the "next" and "prev" buttons, or when a special active content is activated.
    MediaBag
    This class stores and manages all the media components (images, sounds, animations, video, MIDI files, etc.) needed to run the activities of a JClicProject.
    MediaBagEditor  
    MediaBagElement
    MediaBagElements are the members of MediaBag objects.
    MediaBagElementEditor  
    MediaBagElementEditorPanel  
    MediaBagMultiEditorPanel  
    MediaBagSelector  
    MediaPreviewPanel  
    NewActivityPanel  
    SelectActivityClass
